sentence: Rep. Peter Meijer, one of the Republicans who voted to impeach Trump over January 6, is also set to face a Trump-backed primary challenger.
author: Grace Panetta
title: A guide to the most important primary elections of the 2022 midterms, which will test Trump's influence over the GOP

sentence: He also made fun of Representative Peter Meijer's last name.

title: How to Watch Trump North Carolina Rally: Time, Live Stream for Selma Speech
